lifecycleScripts.afterStart: wp-env run cli -- wp theme activate wp-soli-clean-theme && wp-env run cli -- wp option update blogname 'Soli Administration' && wp-env run cli -- wp option update blogdescription 'Administration and Authentication' && wp-env run tests-cli -- wp theme activate wp-soli-clean-theme && wp-env run tests-cli -- wp option update blogname 'Soli Administration' && wp-env run tests-cli -- wp option update blogdescription 'Administration and Authentication'
